verses.roman:
gopa-līlāya pāilā yei prasāda-vasane
mātāre pāṭhāna tāhā purīra vacane

synonyms: gopa-līlāya—in His pastimes as a cowherd boy; pāilā—got; yei—whatever; prasāda—remnant; vasane—clothing; mātāre—unto His mother; pāṭhāna—sent; tāhā—that; purīra vacane—on the order of Paramānanda Purī.
translation: Following the order of Paramānanda Purī, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu sent His mother the prasāda clothing left by Lord Jagannātha after His pastimes as a cowherd boy.
